nodes.text: Nerrick was a Human male sergeant of the Galactic Republic during the Galactic War. Around 3641 BBY he was stationed in the Maximum Security Section of the Belsavis prison, when his fellow Sergeant Ganno ordered the artillery to shoot down a ship that did not response to a request to provide ID. Nerrick disagreed with Ganno's decision, though it was proven correct when a Republic citizen uncovered that the ship belonged to a smuggler trying to supply to aid in the escape of a crime lord imprisoned on Belsavis.
